bf3299ab-9821-46b0-841a-7b05b57ac15a.message:
Hello Jane,

I wanted to update you on my mental health diagnosis. I was diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder in December 2022. Since February 2023, I have also been diagnosed with major depressive disorder. My recent assessment indicates that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened.

Please let me know if you need any further details or if we should discuss this.

Best regards,
Mark Evans
